text: John Francis Pitti Hernándezhttps://www.esto.com.mx/250480-john-pitti-pitara- el-mexico-costa-rica/ (born 2 August 1978) is a Panamanian professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2012.FIFA. "Panama: Referees". He refereed some matches in the CONCACAF Champions League. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Panamanian football referees Category:CONCACAF Champions League referees Category:CONCACAF Gold Cup referees Category:2018 FIFA World Cup referees
title: John Pitti
